title: Past Editions
text:
Our conference has a rich history of bringing together the brightest minds in [field/industry]. Below you can explore our past editions, including highlights, notable speakers, and published proceedings.


Theme: “[Previous Year’s Theme]”
Date: July 10-12, 2024
Location: University of Science, City Name
Participants: 450+ attendees from 35 countries



Keynote by Nobel Laureate Dr. [Name]
Special industry panel on [Topic]
Introduction of [New Initiative/Format]
Record number of abstract submissions




The proceedings from the 2024 conference are available in the [Journal Name] special issue and can be accessed here.












Theme: “[Previous Year’s Theme]”
Date: July 8-10, 2023
Location: Metropolitan Convention Center, Different City
Participants: 380+ attendees from 30 countries



Launch of the [Name] Award for Excellence
Virtual participation options introduced
Workshop on [Topic] with industry leaders
Collaboration agreement with [Partner Organization]




The proceedings from the 2023 conference are available in the [Journal Name] special issue and can be accessed here.












Theme: “[Previous Year’s Theme]”
Date: July 12-14, 2022
Location: Research Institute, Another City
Participants: 320+ attendees from 28 countries



First hybrid conference format
Focus on post-pandemic challenges in the field
Introduction of poster session
Special recognition for early career researchers




The proceedings from the 2022 conference are available in the [Journal Name] special issue and can be accessed here.

title: About Us
text:
The Conference Name is dedicated to advancing knowledge and innovation in the field of [specific field]. We strive to create a platform for researchers, practitioners, and industry experts to exchange ideas, share discoveries, and build collaborations that drive progress in our field.



Established in 2018, our conference has grown from a small regional meeting with 120 participants to an international event drawing over 450 attendees from 35+ countries. Throughout our history, we have maintained a commitment to scientific excellence, inclusivity, and fostering connections across disciplines.





 ### Prof. Elizabeth Johnson Chair
Professor of [Field] at University Name email@example.com


 ### Dr. Michael Wong Program Chair
Director of Research at Institute Name email@example.com


 ### Dr. Sarah Patel Local Arrangements
Associate Professor at University Name email@example.com




 ### Prof. Carlos Rodriguez Publications Chair
Professor at University Name email@example.com


 ### Dr. Lisa Chen Sponsorship Chair
Senior Researcher at Company Name email@example.com


 ### Dr. Thomas Smith Student Programs
Professor at University Name email@example.com





Our Scientific Committee comprises leading experts from around the world who ensure the quality and relevance of our conference program:

Prof. Amanda Liu, University Name, Country
Dr. James Rodriguez, Research Institute, Country
Prof. Sophia Kim, University Name, Country
Dr. Daniel Johnson, Company Name, Country
Prof. Maria Gonzalez, University Name, Country
Dr. Robert Brown, Research Institute, Country
Prof. Laura Williams, University Name, Country
Dr. David Lee, Company Name, Country
Prof. Elena Petrov, University Name, Country
Dr. John Adams, Research Institute, Country
Prof. Naomi Torres, University Name, Country
Dr. Michael Wilson, Company Name, Country





Excellence: Promoting the highest standards of scientific research and discourse
Inclusivity: Creating a welcoming environment for participants from diverse backgrounds
Innovation: Encouraging novel ideas and approaches that advance our field
Collaboration: Fostering connections and partnerships across institutions and disciplines
Impact: Supporting research that addresses real-world challenges and creates positive change




Our conference is organized in collaboration with:


 University Name


 Professional Society


 Research Institute

title: SAERD25
text:
Date: October 30-31, 2025
Location: Paññāsāstra University of Cambodia, Siem Reap (PUCSR), Siem Reap, Cambodia
Join us for the premier conference in [field/industry], bringing together leading researchers, practitioners, and industry experts to explore cutting-edge developments and future directions in [specific area].


This year’s theme focuses on [brief description of theme]. We invite participants from around the world to engage in discussions, share insights, and collaborate on addressing the challenges and opportunities in our field.
Register Now






Abstract Submission: March 15, 2025
Early Bird Registration: May 1, 2025 Regular Registration: June 30, 2025
Conference Dates: July 15-17, 2025

text:

3 Days of engaging sessions and workshops
4 Keynote presentations by leaders in the field
20+ Parallel sessions covering diverse topics
Networking opportunities with peers and experts
Poster Session showcasing innovative research
Conference Dinner at a premier venue

title: SAERD25
text:
Keynote Speakers


Dr. Jane Smith

Professor, University of Science
Dr. Smith is renowned for her groundbreaking work in [research area]. With over 100 publications and multiple patents, she has revolutionized how we understand [specific topic]. Her recent book “[Book Title]” has been acclaimed as a seminal text in the field.
View Profile


Dr. Robert Johnson

Chief Scientist, Research Institute
Dr. Johnson leads the [Department Name] at Research Institute, focusing on [research focus]. His team has developed several innovative technologies that have been implemented in [industry/field]. He has been recognized with the [Award Name] for his contributions.
View Profile




Prof. Maria Garcia

Director, Center for Advanced Research
Prof. Garcia has pioneered new methodologies in [research area], leading to significant advancements in [field]. She serves on the editorial boards of several prestigious journals and has chaired numerous international conferences.
View Profile


Dr. David Chen

Principal Researcher, Tech Corporation
With a background spanning both academia and industry, Dr. Chen brings unique insights to [research area]. His work bridges theoretical foundations with practical applications, resulting in [notable achievements].
View Profile
